titles.title: To posthumously award a Congressional Gold Medal to Sergeant Alfredo "Freddy" Gonzalez, in recognition of his heroism in the Vietnam War in February 1968.
To posthumously award a Congressional Gold Medal to Sergeant Alfredo "Freddy" Gonzalez, in recognition of his heroism in the Vietnam War in February 1968.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
